paper_title: Uniqueness and nondegeneracy of ground states for $(-Δ)^su+u=2(I_2\star u^2)u$ in $\mathbb{R}^N$ when $s$ is close to 1
abstract: In this article, we study the uniqueness and nondegeneracy of ground states to a fractional Choquard equation of the form: $(-Δ)^su+u=2(I_2\star u^2)u$ where $s\in(0,1)$ is sufficiently close to $1$. Our method is to make a continuation argument with respect to the power $s\in(0,1)$ appearing in $(-Δ)^s$. This approach is based on [M. M. Fall and E. Valdinoci, Comm. Math. Phys., 329 (2014) 383-404].
publication_venue: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1301.4868 by other authors
